Name: Null Signature System
Details: One of the Terran Hegemony's top secret technologies and restricted to the SLDF, the Null Signature System was used to mask a BattleMech electronic and thermal emissions, using heat baffles and other equipment, and it was first installed in the Exterminator BattleMech. With the fall of the Star League, the technology become LosTech, with almost no known working examples remaining in the Inner Sphere.
